item.title: Four Reasons To Go Beyond VMware Horizon with Citrix XenApp and XenDesktop
item.description:
Four Reasons To Go Beyond VMware Horizon with Citrix XenApp and XenDesktop

Explore four reasons to go beyond the limitations of VMware Horizon with app and desktop virtualization solutions powered by Citrix XenApp and XenDesktop.

item.title: Citrix Delivering Next-Generation ADC for IoT | Citrix Blogs
item.description:
Citrix Delivering Next-Generation ADC for IoT | Citrix Blogs

According to a study by the GSMA (in partnership with Machina Research), it is projected that the number of total connected devices will reach 24 billion worldwide and the potential business impact will reach $4.5 trillion by 2020.
